## Department Resources

# Herrity Building

## Driving Directions

#### **From I-66 West**

  * Exit 57 to Route 50 West – Exit on to West Ox Road (Rt. 608) South – Left on Monument Drive (3rd traffic light) – Pass through one traffic light, then make a right turn at second traffic light on to Government Center Parkway – Second building from the right.



#### **From I-66 East**

  * Exit 55 to Fairfax County Parkway North – Turn right at first light on to Fair Lakes Parkway. At second light, take right on to Monument Drive – Right turn on to Government Center Parkway – Second building from the right.



#### **From Route 29**

  * Turn onto Forum Drive – At first traffic light turn left onto Government Center Parkway – Go through next traffic light and take first left – Herrity Building is the second building from the right.
